menus.title: Get Started
menus.contents:
This is the content for getting started to Configure the Connection for the Dataset.

By default, the API connector (Push) is always enabled to push data into Obsrv. Additional connectors (Pull) can be configured and managed. One dataset can have multiple connectors configured.

Based on the connector type, the details required to successfully connect to the source. E.g.: IP address, credentials, etc. This should be an auto-generated form.
